title: Add enclosingDisk and associated geometric Stream Evaluators
description: This ticket will add the enclosingDisk, getRadius, getCenter and getSupportPoints Stream Evaluators. The enclosingDisk function will calculate the smallest circle that encloses a 2D data set. The implementation is provided by Apache Commons Math.
